text: The Urban Land Institute (also called ULI) is a non-profit research organization dedicated to urban planning and urban development. The institute is located in Washington D.C., United States, with branches in London and Hong Kong. == Other websites == *Urban Land Institute Official Website *Urban Land magazine *ULI Gerald D. Hines Student Urban Design Competition website *J.C. Nichols Prize website *ULI Advisory Services Program Category:Urban planning organizations Category:Non-profit organizations of Washington, D.C.
title: Urban Land Institute
